title: I.R Management Platform
description: I was responsible for creating reusable UI that aligns with the company's design system across multiple sub-apps, implementing complex data visualizations, and ensuring the platform's usability without compromising UI/UX cleanliness.

title: inUI Library
description: Co-authored a comprehensive UI library for internal use, with the main goal of enhancing development efficiency and maintaining a cohesive user experience across applications.

title: Investor Onboarding Portal
description: Co-developed a investor registration and document management platform with KYC verification and compliance features to streamline the onboarding process for new investors that usually requires a lot of paperwork.

title: Credit Healing UI Library
description: As part of the development team, contributed to a collection of reusable UI components and design system elements for building personalized applications for internal and client-facing projects, focusing on ease of use and creative look.

title: Covid News Dashboard
description: Interactive data visualization dashboard tracking COVID-19 statistics with real-time updates and regional breakdowns. Pulling data from multiple APIs and visualizing it using amCharts 4.

title: Social News Dashboard
description: Social media news aggregator that continuously updates and visualizes the defined trending topics using auto-scroll feature, providing up-to-date insights into social media trends and discussions without user interaction.

title: Material Start Page
description: My first frontend project using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Created all the components from scratch using Material Design principles, focusing on responsive design and user-friendly interface. This project served as a foundation for my journey into web development and has a special place in my heart.
